entry.title: Dr. Fauci reacts to Trump ad: It's clear I'm not a political person

media:group.media:title: Dr. Fauci reacts to Trump ad: It's clear I'm not a political person
media:group.media:description:
Dr. Anthony Fauci tells CNN's Jake Tapper the Trump campaign should remove their ad featuring his comments which he says were used out of context.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Kamala Harris: Ruth Bader Ginsburg's legacy is in jeopardy

media:group.media:title: Kamala Harris: Ruth Bader Ginsburg's legacy is in jeopardy
media:group.media:description: Democratic Vice Presidential nominee Sen. Kamala Harris says confirming Amy Coney Barrett to the Supreme Court would put the legacy of the late Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg and health care for million of Americans in jeopardy. #CNN #News

entry.title: Republican voter says Trump is taking down the whole ticket in this swing state

media:group.media:title: Republican voter says Trump is taking down the whole ticket in this swing state
media:group.media:description: President Donald Trump is affecting more that just the presidential race this year. Republican Senator Joni Ernst (R-IA), is facing a tough reelection campaign in part due to her close ties to the President. CNN's Jeff Zeleny reports. #CNN #News

entry.title: 'Let me tell you a political secret ...' Klobuchar blasts hearing

media:group.media:title: 'Let me tell you a political secret ...' Klobuchar blasts hearing
media:group.media:description: Sen. Amy Klobuchar (D-MN) delivers her opening statement at the Supreme Court confirmation hearing for Judge Amy Comey Barrett. #CNN #News

entry.title: Covid-19 cases are rising sharply in parts of Europe

media:group.media:title: Covid-19 cases are rising sharply in parts of Europe
media:group.media:description:
The novel coronavirus has infected more than 37 million people worldwide and caused more than a million deaths. In Germany, Covid-19 cases are rising rapidly, with almost all of its largest cities becoming virus hotspots. Meanwhile, England is rolling out new lockdown rules as the city of Liverpool is set to be placed under tier three lockdown restrictions, the strictest of the country's new Covid-19 rules.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Tapper lays out politicized moves Trump Cabinet is making ahead of election

media:group.media:title: Tapper lays out politicized moves Trump Cabinet is making ahead of election
media:group.media:description: CNN's Jake Tapper lays out the ways in which President Trump's Cabinet secretaries are making politicized moves ahead of the 2020 presidential election. #CNN #News

entry.title: This is the only battleground state Trump is polling ahead

media:group.media:title: This is the only battleground state Trump is polling ahead
media:group.media:description: CNN's John King breaks down the latest Electoral College projections three weeks away from the 2020 election as Joe Biden holds a double-digit lead in national polling average. #CNN #News

entry.title: President's physician: Trump no longer a coronavirus transmission risk

media:group.media:title: President's physician: Trump no longer a coronavirus transmission risk
media:group.media:description:
President Donald Trump's physician Dr. Sean Conley announced in a memo that Trump no longer poses a coronavirus transmission risk.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Trump holds public event despite unclear Covid-19 status

media:group.media:title: Trump holds public event despite unclear Covid-19 status
media:group.media:description:
President Trump, in his first public event since he was diagnosed with coronavirus, gave a brief, campaign-style speech from the balcony of the White House.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Smerconish: There's a feeling this thing is getting away from Trump

media:group.media:title: Smerconish: There's a feeling this thing is getting away from Trump
media:group.media:description: Poll after poll shows Biden with a commanding lead nationally and in battleground states. But remember how many predicted a Clinton landslide in 2016? #CNN #News

entry.title: Keilar: This response from Pence would've embarrassed Pinocchio

media:group.media:title: Keilar: This response from Pence would've embarrassed Pinocchio
media:group.media:description:
CNN's Brianna Keilar breaks down all the times President Trump has gone against scientists after Vice President Pence falsely claimed in the vice presidential debate that Trump follows science.
#CNN #News

entry.title: New details emerge about plot to kidnap Michigan governor

media:group.media:title: New details emerge about plot to kidnap Michigan governor
media:group.media:description:
New details emerge about the men accused in in an alleged domestic terrorism plot to kidnap Michigan Democratic Gov. Gretchen Whitmer, including a history of anti-government views and calls for violence and bloodshed. CNN's Sara Sidner has the details.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Berman: Trump has the poker face of a neon sign

media:group.media:title: Berman: Trump has the poker face of a neon sign
media:group.media:description:
CNN's John Berman discusses the lack of information about President Trump's coronavirus infection as he prepares to host an event at the White House.
#CNN #News

entry.title: The dark truth behind the million-dollar 'black gold' business

media:group.media:title: The dark truth behind the million-dollar 'black gold' business
media:group.media:description:
In July 2020, US authorities seized 13 tons of human hair imported from Xinjiang, China, and alleged the products were made with forced labor. CNN's Ivan Watson traces the supply chain of the multimillion-dollar hair business in the US and uncovers the dark truth behind it.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Bill Gates on vaccine: Not everyone will be willing to take it right away

media:group.media:title: Bill Gates on vaccine: Not everyone will be willing to take it right away
media:group.media:description: CNN’s Anderson Cooper and Bill Gates discuss the state of the coronavirus pandemic in the US and which Covid-19 treatments in the testing phase could be promising for widespread use. #CNN #News
